title: Surfaced Extraction Target v0.1 (OCTO-aligned)
description: Schema for structured tour/experience data extracted from operator websites. Core fields align to OCTO (Open Connectivity for Tours, Activities & Attractions) naming conventions. Surfaced extensions handle escape rooms, combo products, and promotional data.

operator.description: Operator-level metadata extracted from site-wide elements (header, footer, about page, contact page).

name.description: Business name as displayed on the website.

location.description: Business address, typically found in footer or contact page.

phone.description: Primary phone number, typically found in footer or contact page.

email.description: Primary contact email, typically found in footer or contact page.

name.description: Platform name (e.g., FareHarbor, Peek Pro, Bookeo, RocketRez, Gatemaster).

embedUrl.description: Base URL of the booking embed if found (e.g., fareharbor.com/embeds/book/operatorname/).

operatorType.description: Brief characterization of the operator (e.g., 'Family-owned walking tour company', 'Large cruise operator').

otaPresence.description: OTA/review platforms identified on the site (TripAdvisor badges, Viator links, Expedia references, Yelp, etc.).

products.description: All bookable products/experiences identified on the site.

title.description: OCTO Product.title. Public product/experience name exactly as displayed.

shortDescription.description: OCTO Product.shortDescription. 1-2 sentence summary. May be AI-generated from page content if not explicitly present.

description.description: OCTO Product.description. Full narrative description of the experience.

url.description: URL of the product's detail page, if it has a dedicated page.

pricingModel.description: OCTO Product.pricingPer. PER_UNIT = per person pricing. PER_BOOKING = per group/flat rate pricing.

priceByUnit.description: OCTO Unit.pricing. Price per unit type. Amounts in cents (e.g., $179.00 = 17900).

unitType.description: Unit category: adult, child, infant, senior, group, student, military, etc.

label.description: Age range or qualifier as displayed (e.g., 'Ages 13+', 'Ages 5-12', 'Up to 5 guests').

pricingNotes.description: Free-text notes about pricing when full details aren't available (e.g., 'From $89. Child pricing not visible on listing page.').

priceTiers.description: Surfaced extension. Group-size pricing tiers for operators with tiered models.

pricePerUnit.description: Price per unit in cents for this tier.

pricePerBooking.description: Flat price in cents for this tier (if per-booking model).

durationDisplay.description: Human-readable duration as stated on the site (e.g., '10-11 hours', '2.5 hours', '60 minutes').

label.description: Age restriction as stated (e.g., 'Ages 5+', 'All ages', '14+ or accompanied by adult').

schedule.description: OCTO Option.availabilityLocalStartTimes. Known departure/start times if stated on the site.

seasonality.description: Surfaced extension. Operating season if stated.

notes.description: Additional seasonality detail (e.g., 'Summer and winter tours differ in route').

features.description: OCTO Product.features[]. Typed list of product features.

locations.description: OCTO Product.locations[]. Meeting points, drop-offs, and points of interest.

type.description: OCTO location type. START = meeting/pickup point. END = drop-off. POINT_OF_INTEREST = destination visited.

pickupTime.description: Pickup/departure time at this location if specified.

media.description: OCTO Product.media[]. Images associated with the product.

faqs.description: OCTO Product.faqs[]. Question/answer pairs from the page.

cancellationPolicy.description: Free-text cancellation policy as stated on site. Null if not found.

isPrivate.description: Surfaced extension. Whether the experience is private (your group only, no strangers).

difficulty.description: Surfaced extension. Difficulty rating (primarily for escape rooms).

successRate.description: Surfaced extension. Completion/success rate as decimal (primarily for escape rooms).

roomType.description: Surfaced extension. Physical room configuration (escape rooms).

themeGenre.description: Surfaced extension. Theme/genre tags (e.g., mystery, horror, adventure, photography, nature).

upgradeModifiers.description: Surfaced extension. Upsell/upgrade options (e.g., Argosy 'First to Board', premium tiers).

crossOperatorBundles.description: Surfaced extension. Combo products bundling this operator with another operator's product.

partnerProduct.description: Name of the partner's product included in the bundle.

partnerDuration.description: Duration of the partner's portion in minutes.

activePromotions.description: Surfaced extension. Current promo codes, discounts, or deals visible on the site.

displayLocation.description: Where on the site this promotion appears (e.g., 'Site-wide banner', 'Product page', 'Deals page').

bookingSystem.description: Surfaced extension. Booking platform identified for this specific product.

bookingUrl.description: Direct booking URL for this product if found.

extractionMetadata.description: Metadata about the extraction process itself.

pagesUsed.description: URLs of pages that were fed into the extraction.

notes.description: Any extraction notes â€” missing products, known gaps, issues encountered.
